title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: 3D Visual Effects for Disaster Risk Communication Specialists

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of disaster management and communication theories
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design core messages for disaster scenarios using at least three visual representations with 3D visual effects applied
Learners can produce communication materials that improve information delivery efficiency by over 20% considering cognitive load theory
Learners can analyze eye-tracking data to identify at least three cognitive issues arising from 3D visual effects and propose improvement strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
